component.name: GampTask
component.script:
Function init() print "GampTask.init" m.top.functionName = "execGampLoop" end Function
Function execGampLoop() print "GampTask.execGampLoop" port = CreateObject("roMessagePort") m.top.observeField("pageView", port) m.top.observeField("event", port) m.top.observeField("screenView", port) m.top.observeField("transaction", port) m.top.observeField("exception", port)
gamobile_tracking_ids = ["tracking-id-here"] ' tracking id for this channel device = createObject("roDeviceInfo") gamobile_client_id = device.GetPublisherId() 'unique, anonymous, per-device id enable_tracking = NOT device.IsAdIdTrackingDisabled() 'setting in Roku menu to limit tracking
' Init analytics initGAMobile(gamobile_tracking_ids, gamobile_client_id) if enable_tracking then print "Enabling tracking analytics" enableGAMobile(true) endif
while true msg = wait(0, port) if type(msg) = "roSGNodeEvent" then field = msg.getField() data = msg.getData() if field = "pageView" then if data.hostname = invalid then data.hostname = "" if data.page = invalid then data.page = "" if data.title = invalid then data.title = "" gamobilePageView(data.hostname, data.page, data.title) else if field = "event" then if data.category = invalid then data.category = "" if data.action = invalid then data.action = "" if data.label = invalid then data.label = "" if data.value = invalid then data.value = "" gamobileEvent(data.category, data.action, data.label, data.value) else if field = "screenView" then if data.screenName = invalid then data.screenName = "" gamobileScreenView(data.screenName) else if field = "transaction" then if data.transactionId = invalid then data.transactionId = "" if data.affiliation = invalid then data.affiliation = "" if data.revenue = invalid then data.revenue = "" if data.shipping = invalid then data.shipping = "" if data.tax = invalid then data.tax = "" gamobileTransaction(data.transactionId, data.affiliation, data.revenue, data.shipping, data.tax) else if field = "exception" then if data.description = invalid then data.description = "" gamobileException(data.description) end if end if end while
End Function
